attributes.action: keep Great Britains drinking age 18 as Great Britain will lose out on alot of money which will increase tax prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: keep the dirnking age 18 as there will be an increase in taxes. The money that the government receives from 18-20 yr olds from drinking will affect their yearly income drastically as a rapid decrease will happen.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
